00014 #define STD_EXCEPTION_HANDLER_BLOCK catch (std::exception& e) { AppSecInc::Exceptions::STD_EXCEPTION_HANDLER_BLOCK_impl(e); return AppSecInc::Exceptions::default_error_code; }
